paragraphs.text:
%md
### Description
New type of permission appeared in version 0.8 - [Runners](http://zeppelin.apache.org/docs/0.8.0/setup/security/notebook_authorization.html#authorization-setting)
Runners are between Writers and Readers.
As Runners list is empty in note so everybody can view note although Readers list is not empty.

The code below will fill Runners as Writes for each note.

**You must be owner of all notes or have role `zeppelin.notebook.default.owner.username` defined in zeppelin-site.xml**

msg.data:
Description

New type of permission appeared in version 0.8 - Runners
Runners are between Writers and Readers.
As Runners list is empty in note so everybody can view note although Readers list is not empty.

The code below will fill Runners as Writes for each note.

You must be owner of all notes or have role zeppelin.notebook.default.owner.username defined in zeppelin-site.xml

paragraphs.title: Zeppelin Config
paragraphs.text:
%spark.pyspark

zeppelin_host = z.input("Zeppelin host", "localhost")
zeppelin_port = z.input("Zeppelin port", "8080")
zeppelin_user = z.input("User", "admin")
zeppelin_password = z.input("Password", "")

paragraphs.title: Update permissions
paragraphs.text:
%spark.pyspark import requests import json class Izpepelin: def __init__(self): self.session = requests.Session() self.session.auth = (zeppelin_user, zeppelin_password) self.base_url = 'http://' + zeppelin_host + ':' + str(zeppelin_port) def get_notes(self): url = self.base_url + '/api/notebook' response = self.session.get(url).json() if 'exception' in response: raise requests.exceptions.RequestException(url) return response def get_note_permission(self, note_id): url = self.base_url + '/api/notebook/{}/permissions'.format(note_id) response = self.session.get(url).json() if 'exception' in response: raise requests.exceptions.RequestException(url) return response def set_note_permission(self, note_id, data): json_data = json.dumps(data) url = self.base_url + '/api/notebook/{}/permissions'.format(note_id) response = self.session.put(url, data=json_data).json() if 'exception' in response: raise requests.exceptions.RequestException(url) return response try: zepp = Izpepelin() response = zepp.get_notes()['body'] for note in response: auth_info = zepp.get_note_permission(note['id'])['body'] if auth_info['writers'] and not auth_info['runners']: print("Processing note: name - {}, id - {}" .format(note['id'], note['name'])) print("Before:") print(auth_info) auth_info['runners'] = auth_info['writers'] _ = zepp.set_note_permission(note['id'], auth_info) new_auth_info = zepp.get_note_permission(note['id'])['body'] assert auth_info == new_auth_info print("After:") print(new_auth_info) print("------------") except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e: print(" ".join([ "%html", "

Request Failed

", "

{}

".format(str(e)) ]))
